docs.snippet: San Francisco linebacker Aldon Smith was arrested at Los Angeles International Airport after the authorities said he became belligerent during a security screening and threatened that he had a bomb....
docs.lead_paragraph: San Francisco linebacker Aldon Smith was arrested at Los Angeles International Airport after the authorities said he became belligerent during a security screening and threatened that he had a bomb.
docs.abstract: San Francisco 49ers linebacker Aldon Smith is arrested at Los Angeles International Airport after authorities said he became belligerent during a security screening and threatened that he had a bomb; he is now involved in three pending criminal cases.

docs.snippet: The litigation arising from brain injuries in the N.F.L. has prompted George Washington University’s law school to devote a course to the ramifications of such trauma....

docs.abstract: Litigation arising from brain injuries in the NFL has prompted George Washington University’s law school to devote a course to the legal implications of traumatic brain injuries.

headline.main: Concussion Cases Inspire New Course at George Washington’s Law School

docs.snippet: Locally known as the Mane Garrincha Stadium, the 70,000-capacity Estadio Nacional in Brasilia was completed last year for the Confederations Cup and will host seven matches at this year's World Cup....

docs.snippet: The number of people going to watch football in Italian stadiums has dropped by over 800,000 or six percent in the space of a year, the Italian Football Federation (FIGC) said on Monday....
